attributes.action: Ban the existence of ANY secret societies in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are at least 600,000 Freemasons alone in the UK. These people are in local and national government, the judiciary, the forces and the Monarchy. Members of Parliament and judges and police officers should be forced to declare whether they belong to secret societies or better still all secret societies should be banned.
